issue.title: [Python] Class methods in API reference
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1215](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1215). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, if I click on a class in https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/api.html, it only shows its __init__ method. It should probably show all its methods and their docstrings.

comments.body:

This looks like a Sphinx configuration issue, but definitely we need to fix this.
